page.title: 04Sporting Facilities
page.content: I think Clevedon is a nice little town to live in because it is not too big or too small. It has a cricket pitch,football and rugby grounds,tennis courts and a bowling green as well. Clevedon has the Bristol Channel nearby,so that means good fishing and sailing. The golf club up by Walton Castle is one of the best around. Although they are quite good already, I would like to see even more sports facilities for young people. I can't wait for the new swimming pool to be built! The pier should be good when it is rebuilt-people will use it for fishing,and enjoy walking along it. by George Haslock age 11
